lessons.japanese: 君のチームには決勝戦で勝つチャンスはないよ。
lessons.english: Your team doesn't have a prayer to win the championship game.

lessons.japanese: 君のチームが試合に勝ってうれしい。
lessons.english: I'm glad that your team won the game.

lessons.japanese: 君たち二人はこのチームの中心です。
lessons.english: You two are the nucleus of the team.
